definition: is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
that's just the way it is/exactly!
if it were not for/but for
destiny will make enemies meet (idiom)/(often said about lovers who have a disagreement)
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yuan1 jia1 bu4 ju4 tou2

definition: not the right flavor/not quite right/a bit off/fishy/queer/amiss/feel bad/be upset
people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
containing_words.word: 不是一家人不進一家門

definition: not to be trifled with/to be reckoned with
see 不像話|不像话[bu4 xiang4 hua4]
lit. either the fish dies or the net gets torn (idiom)/fig. it's a life-and-death struggle/it's either him or me
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yu2 si3 jiu4 shi4 wang3 po4

sentences.english: It was God, not the sword or the bow, that drove out the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 是上帝將敵人驅逐而不是刀和弓。

sentences.english: But even if it isn't, that wouldn't save the argument.
sentences.chinese: 但是即使它不是，那也挽救不了他的論證。

sentences.english: The purification offering acts on the sanctuary, not on the offerer.
sentences.chinese: 淨化祭是對聖所起作用，而不是對獻祭者。

sentences.english: It's not the case that incongruity causes laughter.
sentences.chinese: 笑不是由不一致引起的。

sentences.english: The only way to avoid that is to lobotomize me, and that's not desirable.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的解決方法是作額葉切除術，那不是我想要的。

sentences.english: du But if it's not reversible, it's not du.
sentences.chinese: 但如果這不是可逆過程，它不等於。

sentences.english: By the way, this isn't at all a question of the author not existing.
sentences.chinese: 並且，這絕對不是有關作者不存在的問題。

sentences.english: No. But incidentally, within the last month or so
sentences.chinese: 不是。很碰巧地，差不多是上個月

sentences.english: Its rhetoric is so flat and unemotional, so overtly unrhetorical.
sentences.chinese: 它的修辭如此平白流暢不帶感情，彷彿不是修辭本身。

sentences.english: That's not vicarious. You're not substituting. It's literal.
sentences.chinese: 這不是替代，你並沒有進行替換，它是遵循原義的。

sentences.english: So my walk is, it's not confident and   I'm not sure if I'm strong in my step yet.
sentences.chinese: 所以我的走姿不是特別自信，擔心步伐會不穩。

sentences.english: So the thermos is not an open system.
sentences.chinese: 因此熱水瓶不是個開系。
那是不是說我們都是猶太教徒？

sentences.english: I hate to say this, but you don't look good in blue.
sentences.chinese: 我真不太想說，但是你穿藍色不是很好看啦。

definition: variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
